SJA-S Pilot Freeze Dryer

Pilot Freeze Dryers

Pilot platform for 4kg-16kg scale process optimization.

  • Flexible Capacity: Ice condenser performance from 4 kg to 16 kg.

  • Precision Shelves: Temperature-controlled shelf areas from 0.12 m² to 1.2 m².

  • Advanced Monitoring: Full range of PAT tools for data-driven process optimization.

  • Custom Solutions: Tailored options to meet specific pharmaceutical and biotech requirements.
